Network analysis data

```{r}
binary_networks_data = read_csv('/Users/noa/Workspace/plant_pollinator_networks_data/binary_networks/network_features.csv')
binary_networks_data$network = paste(binary_networks_data$network,".csv", sep = "")
weighted_networks_data = read_csv('/Users/noa/Workspace/plant_pollinator_networks_data/weighted_networks/network_features.csv')
weighted_networks_data$network = paste(weighted_networks_data$network,".csv", sep = "")
```

Features analysis data

```{r}
weighted_features_data = read_csv('/Users/noa/Workspace/plant_pollinator_networks_data/weighted_plants/plant_features_with_classification.csv')
binary_features_data = read_csv('/Users/noa/Workspace/plant_pollinator_networks_data/binary_plants/plant_features_with_classification.csv')
binarized_features_data = read_csv('/Users/noa/Workspace/plant_pollinator_networks_data/binarized_plants/plant_features_with_classification.csv')

binarized_labeled_data<- binarized_features_data %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_missing = mean(is.na(is_polyploid))) %>% ungroup() %>% filter (!is.na(is_polyploid)) %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_poli = mean(is_polyploid==1)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate (is_polyploid = as_factor(is_polyploid)) %>% filter (!network %in% c('106.csv','107.csv','156.csv','157.csv','158.csv','159.csv') )

weighted_labeled_data<-weighted_features_data  %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_missing = mean(is.na(is_polyploid))) %>% ungroup() %>% filter (!is.na(is_polyploid)) %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_poli = mean(is_polyploid==1)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate (is_polyploid = as_factor(is_polyploid)) %>% filter (!network %in% c('106.csv','107.csv','156.csv','157.csv','158.csv','159.csv') ) #%>% left_join(weighted_networks_data , on = "network")

binary_labeled_data<-binary_features_data  %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_missing = mean(is.na(is_polyploid))) %>% ungroup() %>% filter (!is.na(is_polyploid)) %>% group_by(network) %>% mutate(pct_poli = mean(is_polyploid==1)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate (is_polyploid = as_factor(is_polyploid)) %>% filter (!network %in% c('46.csv','48.csv','50.csv','51.csv','54.csv','55.csv','56.csv','57.csv','61.csv','62.csv','63.csv','64.csv','66.csv','70.csv','71.csv','72.csv','73.csv') ) #%>% left_join(binary_networks_data , on = "network")

names(weighted_labeled_data)<-make.names(names(weighted_labeled_data),unique = TRUE)
names(binarized_labeled_data)<-make.names(names(binarized_labeled_data),unique = TRUE)
names(binary_labeled_data)<-make.names(names(binary_labeled_data),unique = TRUE)

```



Generating GLM data

```{r}
weighted_glm_data<-  weighted_labeled_data %>% select(network,is_polyploid,original_name, family,normalised.degree,partner.diversity,d, original_name, pct_missing, pct_poli,delta_transformed_.d,nestedness_contribution, delta_transformed_.proportional.generality, interaction.push.pull) #number.of.species.LL,number.of.species.HL
                                      #%>%  remove_missing() 

binary_glm_data<- binary_labeled_data %>% select(network,is_polyploid,original_name, family,normalised.degree,partner.diversity,d,original_name,pct_missing, pct_poli,delta_transformed_.d,nestedness_contribution, delta_transformed_.proportional.generality, interaction.push.pull)

binarized_glm_data<-binarized_labeled_data %>% select(network,is_polyploid,original_name, family,normalised.degree,partner.diversity,d,original_name,pct_missing, pct_poli,delta_transformed_.d,nestedness_contribution, delta_transformed_.proportional.generality, interaction.push.pull)

all_binary_glm_data<- union(binary_glm_data, binarized_glm_data)

```


Basic visualisation

```{r}
all_binary_glm_data %>% ggplot(aes(x =delta_transformed_.d , color= is_polyploid))+ geom_density()
all_binary_glm_data %>% ggplot(aes(x =d , color= is_polyploid))+ geom_density()
all_binary_glm_data %>% ggplot(aes(x =nestedness_contribution , color= is_polyploid))+ geom_density()
all_binary_glm_data %>% ggplot(aes(x = delta_transformed_.proportional.generality,color= is_polyploid ))+ geom_density()
all_binary_glm_data %>% ggplot(aes(x = interaction.push.pull,color= is_polyploid ))+ geom_density()
```

```{r}
#weighted
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)

all_binary_glm_data_no_null<- binarized_glm_data  %>% remove_missing() #%>% filter (pct_missing>0.6, pct_poli>0, pct_poli<1)

mixed1 = lmer(d ~(is_polyploid)+(1|network)+(1|original_name), data =all_binary_glm_data_no_null)
print(summary(mixed1))

mixed2 = lmer(delta_transformed_.d ~(is_polyploid)+(1|network)+(1|original_name), data = all_binary_glm_data_no_null)
print(summary(mixed2))

mixed3 = lmer(nestedness_contribution ~(is_polyploid)+(1|network)+(1|original_name), data = all_binary_glm_data_no_null) 
print(summary(mixed3))

mixed4 = lmer(delta_transformed_.proportional.generality ~(is_polyploid)+(1|network)+(1|original_name), data = all_binary_glm_data_no_null) 
print(summary(mixed4))


mixed5 = lmer(interaction.push.pull ~(is_polyploid)+(1|network)+(1|original_name), data = all_binary_glm_data_no_null) 
print(summary(mixed5))
```
